email-template.subject: Asset Bank Automatic Email
email-template.body:
Dear Asset Bank user
This email has been automatically sent to you by Asset Bank because a date specified on one or more assets has been reached.
The asset attribute is: #rule_attribute#. The rule that has triggered is: #rule_name#. Message: #rule_message#
Assets (id and title): #asset_list#
Regards, Image Bank Admin
